name: Petrified (airixs)
description:
Story

You haunt in this dungeon for decades. It is your responsibility to protect your home and repel all intruders. Ghosts can't move in the light and can't hurt anyone physically, but they can leave a mental scar. Your end goal is to be as scary as you can and break even the strongest of minds.

Controls

WASD - Move around

Mouse - Look around

SHIFT - Sneak (you make less noise)

E - Taunt (makes a loud scream which deals more mental damage, but this also increases enemy reaction)

Disclaimer

This game is in development, so any suggestions or bug reports will be appreciated.
